comment: I wasn't familiar with how +=1 was a legal expression. can anyone explain this?

i think they should explain the environment model of evaluation here.  The variables total_gold, romania_gold, etc. are stored in the global environment. The first call to compute total_gold sums the values of romania_gold, us_gold, uk_gold with their original values. Changing romania_gold changes the value referenced by the variable. Calling total_gold returns the value referenced by the variable.

The additional funds we are asking for is not survival but to thrive! MIT gives $1-2 million every year to MIT OpenCourseWare and that's not going away. We've been publishing for 20+ years now, e.g. MIT has given tens of millions of dollars away for free (not to mention the generous material contributions of all the instructors and students at MIT... which is purely voluntary). We will always be publishing courses... but we could always publish more with more money. You can help us publish more courses and help us share more knowledge. https://ocw.mit.edu/donate

When the total gold is calculated it takes the 1st values of usa uk and romania. If you see step by step after that, even though romania is increased by 1. Total gold=usa+ uk + increased romania is not calculated. So it takes the value of the previous total gold.
